body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Alexander Watson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis. Can you confirm your phone number and email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five six three two one four and my email is alexisramirez@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Alexis. Could you also share your address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State, ZIP code one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that. Is there anything else you would like to add or ask, Alexis?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it for now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you for your time, Alexis. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
